attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent months, the Government has bailed out UK Banks to the tune of Billions of UK Tax Payers Pounds. The banking system is still suffering, and the Economy is still on a downward spiral. We believe that bailing out the UK Consumer, by writing off all Unsecured Debt, will not only stabilise the Economy and increase spending, but also bring Banks back into line, and benefit EVERYONE, not just the BigWigs who caused our Economy to crumble by following Get Rich Quick Schemes.

rejection.details: The government is not in a position to pay off any individual's personal debts. The finance injected into the banking sector has been in the form of purchases of shares in the banks, not paying off any debts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
